titles.title: Deepfakes: A Big Danger for Trust

record.abstract: Deepfakes are everywhere, and it is difficult for many people to identify them. The advance of Artificial Intelligence technology focused on deepfakes can represent a big danger for trust in our society.

pdf-urls.url: /Users/jpxoi/Zotero/storage/IV46HDC3/Fernandez - Deepfakes A Big Danger for Trust.pdf
